name: Moonbeam (Triptech)
description:
MOONBEAM

Made for the Mini Jam 127, with a certain colour palette limitation, and the theme of cats.

This game replicates the feline wonder of chasing light.

This project was slightly rushed, so the levels are few and not as hard as I would have liked to have implemented with more time.

I hope you enjoy it!

Check out my community profile for more games.
